_header: I have a thing and rough it is
_description: ‘A gloue’, a double-entendre riddle — two couplets

CULDd575.Transcription:
I haue a ting and roughe yt is& in th[e] middest a hole ther
                    isTher cam a ȝong man with his gin& thrust yt even a handfull
                    in
CULDd575.Note:
‘a gloue’ written to right. Formerly on a flyleaf of
                    Formerly on a flyleaf of Cambridge UK,  Cambridge University Library Dd.5.76.
